attributes.action: Allow websites to link to other websites without being legally resbonsible for what the website does.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently a website TV-links.co.uk was taken down.  All that TV links did was provide links to other websites.  I don't see how this could be a crime.  All it did was provide information on where to find a website.  Does this mean me telling someone a certain web address gives me legally responsibility of the website and if so surly this impedes on the freedom of speech.  And as a great believer in this freedom shouldn't we legalize or keep legal Internet linking of any kind.
